mn134:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn134:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma lomasakangiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
mn134:2.1: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam nigrodharamam obhasetva yenayasma lomasakangiyo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho candano devaputto ayasmantam lomasakangiyam etadavoca:
mn134:2.3: “Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:2.4: Tvam panavuso, dharesi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca”ti?
mn134:2.5: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:2.6: Dharesi pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gatha”ti?
mn134:2.7: “Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gatha.
mn134:2.10: “Yatha katham pana tvam, avuso, dharesi bhaddekarattiyo gatha”ti?
mn134:2.11: “Ekamidam, bhikkhu, samayam bhagava devesu tavatimsesu viharati paricchattakamule pandukambalasilayam.
mn134:2.12: Tatra bhagava devanam tavatimsanam bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi:
mn134:4.1: Evam kho aham, bhikkhu, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gatha.
mn134:4.2: Ugganhahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn134:4.3: pariyapunahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn134:4.4: dharehi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:4.5: Atthasamhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhango ca adibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn134:5.1: Atha kho ayasma lomasakangiyo tassa rattiya accayena senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena savatthi tena carikam pakkami.
mn134:5.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena savatthi jetavanam anathapindikassa aramo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma lomasakangiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn134:5.3: “Ekamidaham, bhante, samayam sakkesu viharami kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
mn134:5.4: Atha kho, bhante, annataro devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam nigrodharamam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, bhante, so devaputto mam etadavoca:
mn134:5.6: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, tam devaputtam etadavocam:
mn134:5.7: ‘na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:5.8: Tvam panavuso, dharesi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca’ti?
mn134:5.9: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:5.10: Dharesi pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gatha’ti?
mn134:5.11: ‘Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gatha.
mn134:5.14: ‘Yatha katham pana tvam, avuso, dharesi bhaddekarattiyo gatha’ti?
mn134:5.15: ‘Ekamidam, bhikkhu, samayam bhagava devesu tavatimsesu viharati paricchattakamule pandukambalasilayam.
mn134:5.16: Tatra kho bhagava devanam tavatimsanam bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca abhasi:
mn134:5.21: Evam kho aham, bhikkhu, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gatha.
mn134:5.22: Ugganhahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn134:5.23: pariyapunahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn134:5.24: dharehi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn134:5.25: Atthasamhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhango ca adibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn134:5.28: Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca desetu”ti.
mn134:6.2: “Na kho aham, bhante, janami tam devaputtan”ti.
mn134:6.4: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto atthim katva manasikatva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasoto dhammam sunati.
mn134:6.5: Tena hi, bhikkhu, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
mn134:6.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma lomasakangiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn134:8-13.10: evam kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn134:8-13.11: Kathanca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati …pe…
mn134:8-13.12: evam kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn134:14.18: Attamano ayasma lomasakangiyo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
